Location: HYBRID HEARING - Council Chambers - City Hall

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be four percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $250,000, or not more than $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be four percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $250,000, or not more than $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be seven percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,000, or more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be seven percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,000, or more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,0

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be 14 percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $450,000, or more than $450,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 14 percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $450,000, or more than $450,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: SEBCO IV; Block 2697, Lot 18 and 19; and Block 2732, Lot 31, Bronx, Council District No. 17.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: SEBCO IV; Block 2697, Lot 18 and 19; and Block 2732, Lot 31, Bronx, Council District No. 17.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on real estate and for the discount rate to be allowed for early payment of real estate taxes for Fiscal Year 2023, pursuant to the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYC Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2023.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2023 for non-payment of taxes on real estate and for the discount rate to be allowed for early payment of real estate taxes for Fiscal Year 2023, pursuant to the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: NYC Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2023.
